data.name: The Sun of Broken Euphoria
data.detailed_description:
Have you ever heard of the space-time continuum? And have you ever had the luck (or misfortune) to be alone with the laws of time? Two completely ordinary teenagers got into an unequal deadly battle of a mysterious pioneer camp, where every situation is like a shot, and a word is a projectile.
Waiting for you:

• More than 5 hours of non-stop narration, where you will get involved in the most real intrigues;

• Discover more than 12 endings by learning the consequences of your fateful decisions;

• More than 40 art;

• Interesting story and karma system.

And then you will find out only in the game itself. Forward and with a song, pioneer!

(The game is in development)

Attention! The game has a checkmate and black humor!
Attention! The game is in development!

Two completely ordinary teenagers got into an unequal deadly battle of a mysterious pioneer camp, where every situation is like a shot, and a word is a projectile.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP/Vista/7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Pentium® 4 1.5 GHz / Athlon® XP
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX® 9.0c compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2,02 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 9.0c compatible

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content that is not suitable for all ages or for viewing at work: Nudity or scenes of a sexual nature, dismemberment, violence, as well as obscene language - Adult content.
